name: Happy New Rocket!
description:
Battle for the best fireworks show until midnight in this frantic 1v1 Online game!

Fill up the crates with as many fireworks as you can before the clock hits zero and make sure they are on YOUR side when the round ends. But beware, there are NO RULES in this competition!!! Steal your opponents crates, hit them with a wrench... Anything goes.

Join the Happy New Rocket! discord if you're searching for someone to play with: https://discord.gg/MHu4AqZC6v Controls:
  • Movement - WASD
  • Rotation - Mouse movement
  • Attack - Left click
  • Interact - E
Notes: 

- Everything in this game was made in 6 days from scratch with no previous networking experience. Because of that, you might find sync issues here and there. Also, the matchmaking is very simple, you have no control on who you play with, it just connects you to someone who is also looking for a match.

- If you can't find anyone on the matchmaking queue and still want to test the game you can open two instances and connect with yourself!

Made by:
  • @k__y__x - 3D Artist
  • @diotins - Gameplay Programmer
  • @ruimartinsdev - Online Programmer 
  • @NCarrico98 - VFX Artist

"Thank you to Weekly Game Jam for the amazing time we had developing this game, it was a BLAST! (No pun intended...)"
